title: Sonnathu Sonnathu Lyrics Aranamani Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Sonnadhu sonnadhu nee thaney
sondhamum anenney..
nenachadhu nenachadhu ellamey
nadandhidum nesamthaney..

Kaaththaaga naan aanalaum
un moochil kalandhirupen.
kanavaaga naan aanalum
unakaga kaathirupean.

Sonnadhu sonnadhu nee thaney
sondhamum anenney..
nenachadhu nenachadhu ellamey
nadandhidum nesamthaney..

Aala marathil unjal pottu
aadum podhu kaathaa vandhu
eera idupa killi, thee moottiduva

Paasi pootha kulaththil naanum
pathi kaluthu mungi kuzhikka
muthugu pakkam vandhu
thee moottiduva..

Anbe sayum thannala
aattu mandhai pinnala
manja kaatil naan irukka
nenju koottil nee iruka
kuzha saami sela kooda
un pol sirikiradhey.

Aasa, kodi, en manasil
unna serum, naalum, en kanavil
koyil vaasal kolam enna
veetu kolam aakkuna
oorukana deepam enna
nenjukulla eathuna.

Un nenapu intha usiril
ini oru naalum pogadhu
nee kedacha athu pothum
vera varam ingu yedhu.

enaku enna aacho..
unaku enna aacho..
kaadhal namakkul vandhacho..

Sonnadhu sonnadhu nee thaney
sondhamum anenney..
nenachadhu nenachadhu ellamey
nadandhidum nesamthaney..

Kaaththaaga naan aanalaum
un moochil kalandhirupen.
kanavaaga naan aanalum
unakaga kaathirupean.
